      public int getScore(String username)

    • setGame

      public void setGame(GAME game)
      SETTERS

    • setFirstLogin

      public boolean setFirstLogin(String username, int LobbySize)
      This method sets the login for the first client to connect to the server.
      Parameters:
      username - : the client's username
      LobbySize - : the number of players for the game
      Returns:
      true if the username is not already in use and if the lobbysize is between 2 and 4

    • setLogin

      public boolean setLogin(String username) throws RemoteException
      This method adds a player to the game. When the lobby is full it sets up the game
      Parameters:
      username - : the client's username
      Returns:
      true if the username is not already in use and if the lobby is not full
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • setLoginReconnection

      public boolean setLoginReconnection(String username)
      This method reconnects a client that was disconnected
      Parameters:
      username - : the username of a client that was disconnected
      Returns:
      true if the username was already chosen and if the client with that username was disconnected

    • setTurn

      public void setTurn()
      This method calls the method masterStartTurn() of the GAME class. If the game is over it sends to all the clients the winner of this game

    • setDraw

      public boolean setDraw(String username, int n, int m)
      This method sets the draw made by the clients.
      Parameters:
      username - : the username of the client who made the draw
      n - : the row in which the drawn item is located on the board
      m - : the column in which the drawn item is located on the board
      Returns:
      true if the player draw is valid

    • setBookshelf

      public boolean setBookshelf(String username, int m, int a, int b, int c)
      This method puts in the bookshelf the items drawn by the client
      Parameters:
      username - : the username of the client who made the put
      m - : the column in which the drawn items will be placed
      a - : it's the order of the first item to put in the bookshelf
      b - : it's the order of the second item to put in the bookshelf
      c - : it's the order of the third item to put in the bookshelf
      Returns:
      true if the put is valid

    • setEndTurn

      public void setEndTurn(String username) throws RemoteException
      This method ends the turn of the player and sets the next turn. If the game is over it sends to all the clients connected their personal score and the winner of the game
      Parameters:
      username - : the client's username
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • setChat

      public void setChat(MESSAGE message) throws RemoteException
      This method sends the message to a specific client (if the message is private) or to every client connected
      Parameters:
      message - : the message written by a client
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • disconnected

      public void disconnected(String username) throws RemoteException
      This method removes a client who logged out, notifies the other clients connected and sets the next turn. If there is only one player left, the game ends and that player is the winner; if a client disconnects while it's his turn, the turn ends.
      Parameters:
      username - : the username of the client that logged out
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • sendReconnectionData

      public void sendReconnectionData(String username)
      This method reconnects a client that was disconnected and allows that client to play
      Parameters:
      username - : the username of the client that was disconnected
